text: @LaraLeaTrump @realDonaldTrump How much do you trumps stand to profit off your undying loyalty to and promotion of a drug that has been proven to have more poor results than good in the treatment of COVID-19 patients? Your entire family needs to take the stuff every day, starting now. Do the world a big favor.
